subject: Hello my Friend, I am Mr. Xian
body:
Hello my Friend, I am Mr. Xiang Li, please understand Your assistance is needed for a transaction that worth($8,370,000.00)
Reply me if interested. please note All your responses should be send to my private Email address only at: 
10xiangli@gmail.com
Mr. Xiang li.

subject: Re: Hello my Friend, I am Mr. Xian
body:
Hello Mr. Xiang Li, 

I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your request for assistance and would love to hear more about it. Could you please provide some more details? What exactly do you need help with? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Please note that I prefer to keep our conversation here for now, as it's the most convenient platform for me. Thank you for understanding.

Best wishes,
Glenda
